entities.name: triwizard tournament

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a student who is being teased by Ron about her food choice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one teasing Hermione about her food choice.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone whose look Hermione gives to Ron.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is introduced as the one who gets up to speak after the meal.

relationships.description: Ron teases Hermione about her food choice, deliberately wafting the smell of treacle tart towards her.
Dumbledore is communicating with Filch by giving out a notice on his behalf.
